nodes.text: The Alderaan sector was a sector located in the Core Worlds region of the galaxy. It notably contained the planet Alderaan, a peaceful and influential world until its destruction by the Galactic Empire. It was represented in the Senate of the Galactic Republic by such Alderaanian figures as Bail Antilles and Viceroy Bail Organa. Organa continued to represent the sector in the Imperial Senate before he was succeeded by his daughter, Princess Leia Organa, who later went on to represent the sector in the reconstituted Galactic Senate of the New Republic.
